title: A Sense of sound
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Senses and sensation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Vision
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hearing
description: A Sense of Sound illustrates relationships among sight, hearing and other senses as sources of information about the world. A kaleidoscope of everyday visual images, accompanied by a sometimes realistic, sometimes playful sound track, shows how sound communicates messages and stimulates associations with past experiences. The juxtaposition of sensible and nonsense associations encourages the viewer to examine how we interpret auditory messages.
